data.title: Dililì in Paris

data.text:
Original Title: Dililì à Paris

Director: Michel Ocelot

Screenplay: Michel Ocelot

Photography: Michel Ocelot

Editor: Patrick Ducruet

Music: Gabriel Yared

Voices: Prunelle Charles Ambron, Enzo Ratsito, Natalie Dessay

Production: Nord-Ouest Films

Distribution: MoviesInspired

Year: 2018

Country: France

Length: 95’

Synopsis: With the help of her delivery-boy friend, Dilili, a young Kanak, investigates a spate of

mysterious kidnappings of young girls that is plaguing Belle Epoque Paris. In the course of her

investigation she encounters a series of extraordinary characters, each of whom provides her with

clues that will help her in her quest…
